headline: From Amex to leadership inspiration: Kenneth Chenault's story
summary: As Black History Month progresses, Wealth host Brad Smith spotlights Kenneth Chenault, the distinguished former chairman and CEO of American Express (AXP), who led the company from 2001 to 2018. Smith's feature explores Chenault's remarkable career trajectory, highlighting his transformative leadership that propelled American Express to new heights of success and positioned him as a trailblazing business leader in corporate America. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith
